doc:
Michael Knowles (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Knowles_(actor) 0 Michael Knowles (born 1937) is an English actor and scriptwriter. He is best known for his roles in BBC sitcoms written by David Croft and Jimmy Perry. Michael_Knowles ( born 1937 ) is an_English_actor_and_scriptwriter . He is_best_known for his_roles in BBC_sitcoms written by David_Croft and Jimmy_Perry .
